name: DinoWars Evolution (Canceled)
blurb: A turn-based strategy game featuring your favorite dinosaurs, for kids of all ages! Stomping across your iOS device soon!

rewards.reward:
DINO-INSURANCE TIER
=============================
"Dino Protection Insurance!" For just the cost of a dollar we can guarantee you will not to be eaten, stomped, or crushed by any dinosaur. This does not cover museum incidents.
We will publish a "thank you" for your pledge on our website, so you can rest assured the dinosaurs will know not to stomp you.
You also receive an exclusive Facebook wallpaper.

PROTOMAMMAL TIER

=============================

You will receive a copy of the game for your iOS device as well as a special "thank you" in the game credits.
You also receive a special avatar to let the world know you were an early supporter.
Finally, we will send you a PDF dinosaur coloring book to print and color.

OVIRAPTOR TIER
=============================
Everything from the Protomammal Tier, PLUS:
Exclusive wallpaper for your iOS device and a digital soundtrack from our game.

HADROSAUR TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
A larger sets of high resolution wallpapers for your computer and a DinoWars Evolution sticker sheet!

DINO-ADVISOR TIER =============================  Everything mentioned above, PLUS: An Advanced Membership on our advisory board, for people most interested in participating with Sticky Toffee and DinoWars Evolution's future. Description of member involvement is provided on your left.
PACHYCEPHALOSAUR TIER =============================\r\nEverything mentioned above, PLUS:\r\nA DinoWars Evolution poster for your wall.

VELOCIRAPTOR TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
You get to help design a power card. Your ideas can make their way into the game!
You will also become a member of our advisory board, able to weigh in on our plans as our company grows.
All this, plus your poster will be signed by the team.

STRETCH GOAL REWARDS:
If we meet our top stretch goal and create Story Mode, you will be able to name a geographic feature in a region of the world your dinosaurs will explore! (name subject to approval)

ANKYLOSAUR TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
A set of 3D printed sculptures of dinosaurs from the game.

As an additional stretch goal reward, name an entire region of our world! (name subject to approval)

TRICERATOPS TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
We will name a power card after you.

As an additional stretch goal reward, you can name a geographic feature and a region of the world, AND you can name a character that other players will encounter in our Story Mode. (name subject to approval)

STEGOSAURUS TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
(Have a special talent to share?) We will use a piece of your artwork on a power card. Musical submissions are accepted as well. (artwork subject to approval)
Your 3D sculptures will be printed in STEEL instead of plastic.

TITANOSAUR TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
Meet with the design team and receive credit as a "Design Consultant" in the final game (Transportation and lodgings not included).
Your 3D sculptures will be printed in SILVER.

TYRANNOSAUR TIER
=============================
Everything mentioned above, PLUS:
Be the voice of the Sticky Toffee Boy, our mascot!
You will also be invited to Seattle for a barbeque with the developers.
Your 3D printed sculptures will be GOLD PLATED.
Finally, you will receive the original, paper-and-models prototype boardgame we used to develop our initial ideas.
And as one last stretch goal reward, you will be able to work with the team and design an entire scenario for Story Mode.
